text: The men's 50 metres event at the 1969 European Indoor Games was held on 8 March in Belgrade. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Zenon Nowosz '''' |Valeriy Borzov '''' |Bob Frith '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 from each heat (Q) and the next 1 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
